## Cohab ERGM

### Static 

```{r ot-ergm-fileprefix, echo=FALSE}
# Folder path should be relative to the GitBook .RProj path
# Include a slash at the end
# If you want the GitBook to completely self-contained in the GitBook directory, copy 
# your desired results into /input/ergm_fits/ and use that as the cohab_ergm_folder
ot_ergm_folder <- './ergms_final/model-fits/'
ot_gof_folder <- './ergms_final/degree-gof/'
ot_netdx_folder <- './ergms_final/netdx/'
# Model name
ot_model_name <- 'ot_bb_conc_B245'
# See file paths below for how prefix is interpreted
ot_ergm_fileprefix <- paste0(ot_ergm_folder, ot_model_name, '_')
ot_netdx_fileprefix1 <- 
    paste0(ot_netdx_folder, 
           gsub('_', '-', ot_model_name), '-')
ot_netdx_fileprefix2 <- paste0(ot_netdx_folder, ot_model_name, '_')
```


```{r pers-ergm-fileprefix, echo=FALSE}
# Folder path should be relative to the GitBook .RProj path
# Include a slash at the end
# If you want the GitBook to completely self-contained in the GitBook directory, copy 
# your desired results into /input/ergm_fits/ and use that as the cohab_ergm_folder
pers_ergm_folder <- './ergms_final/model-fits/'
pers_gof_folder <- './ergms_final/degree-gof/'
pers_netdx_folder <- './ergms_final/netdx/'
# Model name
pers_model_name <- 'pers_bbi_conc_Gb245'
# See file paths below for how prefix is interpreted
pers_ergm_fileprefix <- paste0(pers_ergm_folder, pers_model_name, '_')
pers_netdx_fileprefix1 <- 
    paste0(pers_netdx_folder, 
           gsub('_', '-', pers_model_name), '-')
pers_netdx_fileprefix2 <- paste0(pers_netdx_folder, pers_model_name, '_')
```

```{r cohab-ergm-fileprefix, echo=FALSE}
# Folder path should be relative to the GitBook .RProj path
# If you want the GitBook to completely self-contained in the GitBook directory, copy 
# your desired results into /input/ergm_fits/ and use that as the cohab_ergm_folder
# Include a slash at the end
cohab_ergm_folder <- './ergms_final/model-fits/'
cohab_gof_folder <- './ergms_final/degree-gof/'
cohab_netdx_folder <- './ergms_final/netdx/'
# Model name
cohab_model_name <- 'cohab_bbi_conc_A_msmf445'
# See file paths below for how prefix is interpreted
cohab_ergm_fileprefix <- paste0(cohab_ergm_folder, cohab_model_name, '_')
cohab_netdx_fileprefix1 <- 
    paste0(cohab_netdx_folder, 
           gsub('_', '-', cohab_model_name), '-')
cohab_netdx_fileprefix2 <- paste0(cohab_netdx_folder, cohab_model_name, '_')
```


```{r static-plot-cohab, echo=FALSE, out.width="100%"}
knitr::include_graphics(
    paste0(cohab_netdx_fileprefix2, 'netdx-static.png')
    )
```


### Dynamic Formation

```{r dynamic-form-plot-cohab, echo=FALSE, out.width="100%"}
knitr::include_graphics(
    paste0(cohab_netdx_fileprefix2, 'netdx-dynamic-homogeneous-formation.png')
    )
```
